original: @65a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @65a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious VajravidƒÅra·πáa.

original: rna ba'i dbang po nyams shing rna ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po nyams shing rna ba gso bar 'dod pa'i sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
translated: A practitioner who has impaired hearing and wishes to heal his ears should be endowed with the pledges.

original: zhag gsum smyung bar gnas shing gos gsar pa gyon la khrus kyi cho ga brgya rtsa brgyad byas la /
analyzed: zhag gsum smyung bar gnas shing gos gsar pa gyon la khrus kyi cho ga brgya rtsa brgyad byas la /
translated: He should fast for three days, put on new clothes, and perform the ear-washing rite one hundred and eight times.

original: de'i rjes la bdag nyid rdo rje rnam bar 'joms bsku mdog ljang gur dmigs la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pas /
analyzed: de'i rjes la bdag nyid rdo rje rnam bar 'joms bsku mdog ljang gur dmigs la bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas 'phags pa mchod sems can gyi don byas pas /
translated: After that, visualize yourself as green VajravidƒÅra·πáa. Light radiates from the seed syllable in your heart, makes offerings to the noble ones, and benefits sentient beings.

original: phrin las bzhi'i 'dod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas pas /
analyzed: phrin las bzhi'i 'dod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas pas /
translated: It fulfills all wishes for the four activities.

original: de nas yang 'od 'phros pas sngar dang 'dra /
analyzed: de nas yang 'od 'phros pas sngar dang 'dra /
translated: Again light radiates and returns as before.

original: de nas 'od 'phros pas sgra'i lha mo grangs med pa 'phros te /
analyzed: de nas 'od 'phros pas sgra'i lha mo grangs med pa 'phros te /
translated: Then light radiates and countless sound goddesses emanate.

original: de dag re re las kyang sprul ba'i lha mo dpag tu med pa 'phros te /
analyzed: de dag re re las kyang sprul ba'i lha mo dpag tu med pa 'phros te /
translated: From each of them countless emanated goddesses radiate.

original: snang ba thams cad sgra'i lha mo zhal nas sgra snyan pa sna tshogs pa brjod pas /
analyzed: snang ba thams cad sgra'i lha mo zhal nas sgra snyan pa sna tshogs pa brjod pas /
translated: All appearances are goddesses of sound, and their mouths utter various pleasant sounds.

original: phyag na sgra snyan pa'i byung khungs bi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams shing de nyid kyi sgras sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du mchod pa'i bye brag sprin rnam par byed pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod nas /
analyzed: phyag na sgra snyan pa'i byung khungs bi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams shing de nyid kyi sgras sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad du mchod pa'i bye brag sprin rnam par byed pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod nas /
translated: They hold various musical instruments such as vƒ´·πáƒÅs, flutes, clay drums, and so on. The sound of those instruments emanates various offerings to all the buddha realms. Having made offerings to the buddhas and bodhisattvas,

original: slar ye shes kyi 'od phung chen po gcig tu gyur nas /
analyzed: slar ye shes kyi 'od phung chen po gcig tu gyur nas /
translated: they again become a great mass of light.

original: bdag nyid la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim nas /
analyzed: bdag nyid la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la thim nas /
translated: They circle you three times and dissolve into the seed syllable in your heart.

original: de nyid thim pas lus ngag khro bo rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du dmigs la /üîΩtshogs rdzogs par bya /
analyzed: de nyid thim pas lus ngag khro bo rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi nga rgyal du dmigs la / tshogs rdzogs par bya /
translated: Imagine that your body and speech are VajravidƒÅra·πáa.

original: de nas yang 'od 'phros pas lha mo de dag gis gong ltar sems can gyi don byas nas /
analyzed: de nas yang 'od 'phros pas lha mo de dag gis gong ltar sems can gyi don byas nas /
translated: Again light radiates from the seed syllable in your heart, and goddesses emanate as before. They perform the benefit of sentient beings.

original: yang ye shes kyi 'od phung po chen po gcig tu gyur nas /
analyzed: yang ye shes kyi 'od phung po chen po gcig tu gyur nas /
translated: Again, the mass of light of timeless awareness becomes a great sphere of light.üîΩ

original: bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim pa snga ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon la bstim pa snga ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: Again, the mass of light of pristine consciousness becomes a great sphere and dissolves into the seed syllable in my heart center, as before.üîΩThen, having emanated once and accomplished the two benefits, it dissolves into my ear.üîΩI visualize the complete pristine consciousness of the pure, stainless, and luminous ear of all buddhas.

original: de nas lan gcig 'phros nas don gnyis rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi rna ba la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan rnam par dag pa dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba ye shes kyi mkhyen pa rdzogs par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigsüîΩpar bzlas so //
analyzed: de nas lan gcig 'phros nas don gnyis rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi rna ba la thim pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snyan rnam par dag pa dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba ye shes kyi mkhyen pa rdzogs par dmigs shing snying po rgyas bsdus ci rigs par bzlas so //
translated: Recite the essence mantra as much as appropriate.

original: rna ba na ba rnams la khug chos chen po'i phye ma dang / rtsi mar la bzlas te blugs /
analyzed: rna ba na ba rnams la khug chos chen po'i phye ma dang / rtsi mar la bzlas te blugs /
translated: For those with ear pain, recite over a large amount of sesame seeds and butter and pour it into the ear.

original: 'on zhing sgra mi thos ba rnams la 'bru mar dang ru rta la bzlas te byug go //
analyzed: 'on zhing sgra mi thos ba rnams la 'bru mar dang ru rta la bzlas te byug go //
translated: For those who are deaf and cannot hear, recite over sesame oil and ghee and apply it.

original: zug che zhing gzer ba rnams la mar sna tshogs dang sbrang rtsi la bzlas @65b la rtsa rnams la byugs te nyi ma la sreg go //
analyzed: zug che zhing gzer ba rnams la mar sna tshogs dang sbrang rtsi la bzlas @65b la rtsa rnams la byugs te nyi ma la sreg go //
translated: For those with severe pain and cramps, recite over various butters and honey and apply it to the veins.

original: rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i nad gso ba'i cho ga / sgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: rna ba'i dbang po nyams pa dang de'i nad gso ba'i cho ga / sgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The one called Victorious over Sound composed by the master J√±ƒÅnavajra is complete.
